description:
Polar Bear gets a taste of what`s it’s like to be on the receiving end of puns.  Full-Time Panda and Llama have a wild night!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daja Cafe / Coffee no Oishisa no Himitsu / Joukin-san to Llama-san to Rin Rin
Pun Cafe! / Mr. Full-Time Panda, Mr. Llama, and Rin Rin!
ダジャカフェ / コーヒーのおいしさの秘密 / 常勤さんとラマさんとリンリン
